sentences.sContent: Incense can attune the finite to the Infinite.
sentences.sContent_eng: Incense can attune the finite to the Infinite.
sentences.sCn: 熏香可以使有限调谐至无限。

sentences.sContent: Now let us sit quietly and attune to our soul oversoul and source along with the earth mother and nature kingdoms.
sentences.sContent_eng: Now let us sit quietly and attune to our soul oversoul and source along with the earth mother and nature kingdoms.
sentences.sCn: 现在，让我们静静地坐着，调谐向我们的灵魂、超灵和源头，以及地球母亲和自然界王国。

synos.tran: 使协调；使合拍；为…调音；调合波长

remMethod.val: at + tune(调子) → 使调子一致 → 使调和

words.tran: 使协调；为…调音（attune的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to adjust or accustom (a person or thing); acclimatize
